Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: William Herebert, ‘Ave maris stella’ — thirteen couplets

BLAdd46919.First Lines: Hayl leuedy seistoerre bryhtGodes moder edy wyht…
BLAdd46919.Last Lines: …To þe uader cryst and to holy gost beo þonk and heryingeTo þreo persones and o god o menske and worshypinge
BLAdd46919.Note: Previously incorrectly listed as on f. 205; “to þe” expunged from the penultimate line before “holy.”
BLAdd46919.Attributed Title: Aue maris stella & cetera (to right of first line)
